Author: Michael J Fox

Description: The host of the Food Network show “The Pioneer Woman” shares stories on motherhood and marriage.
Author: Ree Drummond

Description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
Author: Michelle Obama

Description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist examines aspects of caste systems across civilizations and reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today.
Author: Isabel Wilkerson

Description: A memoir by the host of the TV game show “Jeopardy!,” from 1984 to 2020.
Author: Alex Trebek

Description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice.
Author: Glennon Doyle

Description: A style journalist looks at the fashion of four members of the British royal family.
Author: Elizabeth Holmes

Book_Title: UNCOMFORTABLE CONVERSATIONS WITH A BLACK MAN
Description: A look at some questions and concepts needed to address systemic racism.
Author: Emmanuel Acho

Description: Photos and stories of people from over 40 countries collected by the creator of “Humans of New York.”
Author: Brandon Stanton

Description: The comedian shares material he collected in an accordion folder over the last 45 years.
Author: Jerry Seinfeld

Description: A collection of the humorist’s essays including “Me Talk Pretty One Day” and “A Guy Walks Into a Bar Car.”
Author: David Sedaris

Description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist explains the influence of the ancient Greeks and Romans on the thinking of America’s founding fathers.
Author: Thomas E Ricks
